attributes.action: Make businesses who were shut during the first lockdown shut fit this one!
attributes.additional_details: This has to be done to protect the public and the NHS. With most of the businesses still open it’s just encouraging people to go out when it’s not essential. Public transport is still too busy and with health care workers and actual essential worker relying on it it is risking them catching it when we need them most.
attributes.background: Force businesses who were closed during the first lockdown to shut for this one. There are many business still open when they are not essential, staff are risking taking the virus home to their families and risking passing the virus to other people if they need to use public transport.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you are concerned about some businesses remaining open during the current lockdown, but we're not sure exactly which businesses you want to be required to close.
                
You could start a new petition explaining which businesses you want the Government to require to close.
